inputSpec.name: ChIP_fastq
inputSpec.label: ChIP Reads
inputSpec.help: A file, in gzipped FASTQ format, with the reads to be mapped

inputSpec.name: Control_fastq
inputSpec.label: Control Reads
inputSpec.help: A file, in gzipped FASTQ format, with the reads to be mapped

inputSpec.name: genome
inputSpec.label: reference genome. mouse: mm9(MGSCv37), mm10(GRCm38); human: hg19(GRCh37), hg38(GRCh38); drosophila: dm3(BDGPr5)

inputSpec.name: bw_out
inputSpec.label: output big wig file or not. The wiggle files can be uploaded to genome browser to view reads distribution along chromosomes.

inputSpec.name: rm_blackList
inputSpec.label: remove peaks from black list or not

inputSpec.name: fragment_size
inputSpec.label: This provides you an option to run peak calling with a specified fragment length instead of estimating it based on cross correlation. Input the number of base pairs like: 200.
